snippet.title: Total Loadout | Announcement Trailer (Steam/PC)
snippet.description:
Wishlist Total Loadout now on Steam! - https://shorturl.at/flIB6

Introducing Total Loadout - a PvP inventory management auto battler where heroes and villains from across space and time clash with powerful weapons! Choose your Champion with special abilities and items, then outwit opponents turn by turn by arranging your inventory tactically to build an unbeatable Loadout.

Join the Total Loadout Community for the latest news on:

Discord - https://discord.gg/NacxgYAw
TikTok - https://tiktok.com/1tkgames
X: https://x.com/1TKgames
YouTube - 1TK Games on YouTube

To find out more about 1TK Games, visit http://1tk.gg
